docs.snippet: Nearly three years ago, Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi won a sweeping national election victory with promises to develop the economy and root out corruption. But with a series of key state elections beginning Saturday, Modi's popularity &#821...
docs.lead_paragraph: Nearly three years ago, Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi won a sweeping national election victory with promises to develop the economy and root out corruption. But with a series of key state elections beginning Saturday, Modi's popularity — and his surprise currency decree that sparked months of financial uproar — is about to be tested.

headline.main: India State Polls Test Modi Popularity After Currency Chaos
headline.print_headline: India State Polls Test Modi Popularity After Currency Chaos
